title: Temple in Jerusalem
summary: Two ancient Israelite and Jewish places of worship on the Temple Mount in the Old City of Jerusalem have been called the Temple in Jerusalem, or the Holy Temple (Hebrew: בֵּית־הַמִּקְדָּשׁ‎, Modern: Bēt HaMīqdaš, Tiberian: Bēṯ HamMīqdāš; Arabic: بيت المقدس‎ Bait al-Maqdis). The First or Solomon's Temple was built in 957 BCE and destroyed by the Babylonians in 586 BCE. The Second Temple was completed in 515 BCE and fell to the Roman Siege of Jerusalem in 70 CE.
